hero.title: Handy Lay
hero.subtitle: Your friendly tile and panel layout planner
hero.description: Plan the perfect tile layout for your walls and floors! Avoid tiny pieces at edges and minimize cuts - making your DIY project look professional and save you money.

interactive.title: Interactive Design
interactive.description: Draw your walls and surfaces with intuitive tools. See real-time updates as you design your space.

textures.title: Rich Texture Library
textures.description: Choose from dozens of realistic textures including wood, stone, ceramic, and fabric patterns.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Instant calculations and real-time preview make planning quick and efficient.

smartLayout.title: Smart Layout
smartLayout.description: Get the best tile arrangement automatically - no more guessing! Our tool figures out the perfect layout to minimize waste and maximize beauty.

visualPreview.title: Visual Preview
visualPreview.description: See exactly how your tiles will look before you start cutting. No more surprises - just confidence in your project!

saveMoney.title: Save Money
saveMoney.description: Reduce waste and buy just what you need. Our calculations help you avoid overbuying tiles and materials.

step1.title: Measure Your Space
step1.description: Enter the dimensions of your wall or floor

step2.title: Choose Your Tiles
step2.description: Input the size of your tiles or panels

step3.title: Get Your Plan
step3.description: We'll create the perfect layout for you

step4.title: Start Tiling!
step4.description: Follow the plan and enjoy the results

benefits.title: Perfect for DIY Enthusiasts
benefits.saveMoneyDesc: Reduce material waste by up to 15% and avoid buying extra tiles "just in case"
benefits.lookProDesc: Get professional-looking results without the professional price tag
benefits.gainConfidenceDesc: Start your project knowing exactly what to do and how much material you need

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of DIY enthusiasts and professionals who are already creating beautiful, waste-free tile layouts with Handy Lay.
